Reviews.Title: Pretty disappointed
Reviews.Author: Erin Janovsky
Reviews.Content: This phone was obviously refurbished -- it's parts aren't flush, so pieces of the back cover stick up and out of place, it's charger port is missing the cover and is exposed when not in use, and the reception is AWFUL -- even when I have three bars (in some places), the phone still won't pick up reception... The car charger that came with the phone doesn't work, and the home charger, which is equipped for EUROPEAN outlets, fell apart the very first time I tried to use it (there was a US adapter).  I would have gladly returned this phone, but was willing to put up with the  other flaws and didn't discover the broken car charger until a week after I had thrown the electrically hazardous home charger away!

Reviews.Title: BAD NEWS MOTOROLA RAZOR PHONES
Reviews.Author: Charles W. White "my business"
Reviews.Content: I purchased a seriously defective Motorola razorphone, and it wasreplaced with another defective phone which I will return today.This one even had the "American Warranty".  But I am still out $30return shipping fees.

Reviews.Title: Unable to Charge - out of box failure
Reviews.Author: Greg Ryker "SoftwareBookBuyer"
Reviews.Content: Unable to charge phone - out of box failure.  Sadly as the phone came with a partially charged battery I thought I had received a working phone until the Amazon return period had expired.  Tried getting a new battery at Batteries Plus, this worked until the new battery also ran out of charge.  Had to buy another phone, basically wasted my money on this one.  Morale of the story - I will NEVER buy a phone online again...

Reviews.Title: Great for international travel
Reviews.Author: Kate "Kate"
Reviews.Content: We travel often and repeatedly to many different countries. We were looking for basic phones that will work anywhere with local SIM cards. These are perfect! We simply remove the card from the last location and insert the card for the new location. When in the US, we use a pay as you go phone plan from a carrier that uses a SIM. In other countries we can use our prepaid SIMS. That way we only pay for the time we actually use the phone in each country.

Reviews.Title: Horrible phone
Reviews.Author: D. Leach
Reviews.Content: This phone sucks! I trusted Amazon and I regret it! Right away, the phone battery won't last a day with very limited talking. The Bluetooth doesn't work and the phone won't send or receive any photos either! I'm in the process of TRYING to return the phone!DON'T BUY!!

Reviews.Title: return
Reviews.Author: Ana A. Henderson
Reviews.Content: I am returning this phone! It was European and would not work on my cell phone provider.

Reviews.Title: another defective unit - will not charge
Reviews.Author: M. Aydin
Reviews.Content: purchased this for phone for a friend, she just told me yesterday that the phone would not charge. just requested a return for the phone

Reviews.Title: Very Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: nicvilla
Reviews.Content: When I recieved the product, everything seemed perfect...The phone was brand new and the box came with everything I was told it would. When I started using the phone, calls kept dropping and people were informing me that they had been trying to reach me, but no calls came in. I asked for a refund but they refused to give it to me. They even took 72 hours to respond to my refund request, when it was already past the 7 day refund period! NEVER buying from them again! I trusted them because they had good ratings but was very dissatisfied with their customer service.  Ridiculous. Ive never had a problem buying on Amazon until I came accross them.

Reviews.Title: do NOT get this phone
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: First one I got appeared to be refurbished not new.Second one I got had the battery completely died in 3 weeks.No sure if it's a problem with the vendor or Amazon, but this source is definitely shady.  I'll give it a 0 star if I could.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Donna Scanzani
Reviews.Content: I wanted a gift for a friend I was going to see out of the country, & I ordered this Motorola RAZR which was delivered promply, Thats the ONLY reason I gave it a 2 instead of a 1,,,the Reasonfor this is the phone speaker did not work at all, No one could hear him talking,It is Not convienent to return it because he lives in the DR and shipping is a nightmare! However I gave him the money it will take to fix this, I'm hoping this can be fixed so that my friend will be able to enjoy the gift I gave him.

Reviews.Title: Its not unlock phone
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my mom send to her over to europe mad sure it is unlock phone and can be use any where but only work over here l am realy desapointed l would not recomend any one to buy it specialy if is a crismas gift I wating for it to retun in the mail .....

Reviews.Title: Motorola razr cell phone
Reviews.Author: Frank Hendzel
Reviews.Content: The cell phone is just as, I ordered.  Arrived quickly, it was purchased to replace the same phone type.  If, I waited and checked I would have upgraded to a smartphone.  My poor decision

Reviews.Title: Always liked this phone
Reviews.Author: GerryB
Reviews.Content: I used this phone on several trips abroad, where I do not want to bring my smart phone.  It arrived in good condition and in working order, has serviced two trips already and will do so again in a few weeks.

Reviews.Title: Sometimes taking 3 steps back is the only way...
Reviews.Author: Harkna5400
Reviews.Content: I have dealt with 'free' phones, "smart" phones, and others in between and still have as of yet to find one as dependable and customizable as a RAZR. It may no longer be manufactured, but as a phone it gets great reception and good sound quality. You can use clips of mp3's or midi files as ringtones, and of course you can change the background image to any pic you take or transfer. It doesn't have a lot of storage, but even pics don't take up much space. In a word, excellent. Anyone who has a sim-based cell phone should consider this a serious backup or work phone.

Reviews.Title: Motorola RAZR V3
Reviews.Author: beehive99
Reviews.Content: I have had a Motorola RAZR V3 for years and this is, by far, the best cell phone I have ever had.  I get good reception and it is easy to use and very user friendly.  Some months ago the display went out on my RAZR and I learned they were no longer available.  I purchased a Samsung cell phone instead and it only took a week to determine it was a lousy phone.  I then ordered a Motorola RAZR V3 from Amazon and was ecstatic when my RAZR arrived.  It didn't take me long to return the Samsung.  Recently I purchased another RAZR because my friendly carrier AT&T; said my old RAZR that I had purchased 3 months ago had a bad antenna in it and there was nothing they could do.  They said I would have to purchase another cell phone.  I then ordered another RAZR from Amazon and two days later, my other RAZR that was supposed to have had a bad antenna in it started working again.  I now know that AT&T; didn't want to admit that it was their tower that was bad, so my RAZR couldn't pick up a reception.  I kept getting a "Network Busy" message.  I'm going to keep the RAZR I just received as a backup in case this happens again because I wouldn't have another brand of phone.  I love it!!!!

Reviews.Title: Really good phone
Reviews.Author: EMAC
Reviews.Content: After I received this phone I was expecting some problems or defects but no this phone is brand new and looks great in black

Reviews.Title: No Warrenty means something is not right
Reviews.Author: Atiq Ahmed
Reviews.Content: I Ordered 2 phones and batteries of both the phones was down. Had to replace the batteries to make the phone work. Not a good investment to make.

Reviews.Title: Using daily works great
Reviews.Author: Kevin M. Arthur "kevamy143"
Reviews.Content: Received it quickly and it works great.  I am using it daily in Belize and have had no hangups with the digicel service here.

Reviews.Title: Happy with it.
Reviews.Author: All-access Customer "Thizbee Sez"
Reviews.Content: The phone works as it should, and it came with some accessories I was not expecting including a ear piece and speaker for hands free talking.  The charger is european and comes with an adaptor that sometimes loosens, so check it periodically.  But the phone itself is great.  I got it as an OLD ATT customer trying not to loose her plan.

Reviews.Title: Best phone ever
Reviews.Author: rcoon3
Reviews.Content: As the title implies this is the best phone ever. I owned one several years back but unfortunately is went into the lake. I opted at the time for a new phone with all the bells and whistles. After several bad experiences with 3 different phones, I came back to the best phone ever Motorola RAZR V3. It's slim, light weight, has a long battery life and gets good reception.

Reviews.Title: This phone wouldn't charge in the US on 110v supply
Reviews.Author: Gammydodger
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for use in Europe when traveling and for use in the US as a spare.Quality of the phone was fine and everything looked well refurbished. Delivered on time and well packaged.The phone worked perfectly in the UK with an O2 SIM card - and it charged perfectly from a 220-240v supplyHowever, when I returned to the US and fitted it with the AT&T; Pay as you Go SIM card, the phone would not charge at all.This is a problem that I am going to contact the Seller about - so I can ask for a new phone

Reviews.Title: dont like
Reviews.Author: charlotte
Reviews.Content: it stoped taking pictures and i ask for a refund and they said i had to send it back i dont thing i should pay fot postage and handing to send it back

Reviews.Title: Refurbished
Reviews.Author: Francisco Cuevas
Reviews.Content: I bought a new cell phone and according to the specifications said it was new, and it turned to be refurbished. I am from Venezuela, how can you help me with this issue? I want a new cell phone. Thanks for your help!

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: kevclif
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a backup, and if it had a memory card slot, it would become my primary phone. I love the call quality of this phone, and it's durability. It is not the most powerful web browser, but who needs to browse.

Reviews.Title: Great product! Had one in the past and bought for the second time
Reviews.Author: SP
Reviews.Content: This is a great product. The device is very slim and has a clear and modern style that I love. It works very well without any bugs. I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Rhonda Wells
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived in very good condition noscratches or damage,I personally do not like the international version.I expected it would be programmed like my old razor so was suprised by the more akward programming.Haven't figured out how to program the voice dial but I'm still trying. It arrived faster than I expected would recommend ordering from this supplier.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported.
Quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies and GPRS data capabilities
VGA digital camera (640 x 480) with video capture; 5 MB memory (not expandable)
Bluetooth for handsfree communication; full duplex speakerphone; access to personal email; web browser; SMS/MMS/EMS messaging
Up to 6.67 hours of digital talk time and 250 hours of standby time
It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
The contents of the box includes - battery, charger and the manual.
ProductInfo.Name: Motorola RAZR V3 Unlocked Phone with Camera and Video Player--International Version with Warranty (Black)
